price: Entonces [Jesús] habló: "Soy un siervo de Dios, Él me revelará el Libro y hará de mí un Profeta.
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِيَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla innī ʿabdu al-lahi ātāniya al-kitāba wajaʿalanī nabiyyan
